description: The taoiseach says he has "terminated" Barry Cowen's appointment as agriculture minister.
title: Barry Cowen: Irish minister sacked over drink-drive row
title_page: Barry Cowen: Irish minister sacked over drink-drive row - BBC News
maintext: In his statement, issued on Twitter, he added: "Unfortunately the decision of the taoiseach to remove me from office, when he supported me this afternoon in the Dail, has undermined and potentially prejudiced my entitlement to fair process."
